doc.field: Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program

1 vol., contents arranged alphabetically by volunteer's last name. The binder contains original and Xeroxed group photos (8 x 10). Two photographs (5 x 7) of each volunteer are consecutively numbered and lettered "a" and "b." The binder also contains a photograph of Herbert L. Wright, Youth Secretary of the National Association for the Advancement of Colored People. Wright was one of several lecturers for the Area Studies component of the Peace Corps Training Program. Invoices, notes and miscellaneous papers related to the photographs are also included.
Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
